title: Orchid Apartments II
details:
We have a BRAND NEW apartment at orchid apartments II
4th floor - 1650 sqft TOWER 1 (A) APARTMENT - over looking the paddy fields north /east..
(A) EXCLUSIVE APARTMENTS NOT AVAILABLE ON ANY FLOORS AT PRESENT
Master bedroom with balcony and attached bathroom
2 bedrooms with common bathroom.
hall and dining over looking the vast paddy fields ..
fully fitted pantry with cupboards.
central gas./smoke detectors/sprinkler systems
gym / pool/entertainment area/ 2 lifts /1 slot allocated parking/plenty of parking space for visitors/24 hour security

Due completion end feb 2018.

NEED TO SELL Immediately..
Bargain price - 23 million...- negotiable - subject to change without notice due increases in taxes shortly.
